unit.utterance: Yek āqāyi bud az deraxt rafte bud bālā dāšt sib mikand
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man on a tree who was picking apples

unit.utterance: baad sibhāyaš rā čid, āvard rixt tuye sabadaš
unit.utterance_translation: After picking the apples, he climbed down to put the apples into the basket

unit.utterance: yek rahgozari hamintori bā gusfandaš rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: somebody passed by with his sheep

unit.utterance: baad yek bačeyi āmad, did u dārad bālāye deraxt sibhā rā mikanad aval xāst yek dāne bardārad baad ke did havāsaš nist sabade sib rā kollan bardāšt
unit.utterance_translation: Then a kid just came and saw that the man is on the tree, first he wanted to take one apple but he took the whole basket

unit.utterance: bā xodaš bord yek dočarxesavāri dāšt az ruberu miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: he took the basket and went away, there was a girl coming the opposite direction

unit.utterance: sabad rixt kolle sibhā rixt birun
unit.utterance_translation: the basket fell and all the apples spilled out of it

unit.utterance: do se tā pesari ke dāštand bāzi mikardand bā ping pong dāštand rad mišodand
unit.utterance_translation: there were a few passing by while playing ping pong
they gathered all the apples for him

unit.utterance: rixtand baad rad šod kolāhaš ham ruye zamin mānde bud
unit.utterance_translation: they put them in the basket and he went away while his hat was still on the ground
they gave him his hat too

unit.utterance: se tā pesarhā ham rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: and the three boys left too

unit.utterance: dāštand az kenāre deraxt rad mišodand ke didand ān āqāhe ke bālāye deraxt dāšt sib mičid
unit.utterance_translation: while they were passing by the tree, they saw the man who were picking apples

unit.utterance: āmad pāyin yek negāhi be inhā andaxt
unit.utterance_translation: he climbed down the tree and took a look at them

unit.utterance: baad zarfe sibhāyaš rā ham šemord
unit.utterance_translation: then he started counting his baskets

unit.utterance: did be jāye inke se tā bāšad do tā ast bā taajob be inhā negāh kard inhā ham rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: he found out one of the basket was not there, he looked at them surprisingly and they just left.
